Reviews.Title: Small but efficient
Reviews.Author: Robert Bell
Reviews.Content: I bought it for its size. Smaller than many other smart phones but does the job. Its an Android phone but apps come with it and new ones add easily. Plus it's self learning and will make a email and text window automaticaly. Lots of fun. Bettery is a bit short on life  if you do a lot of talking or texting though.

Reviews.Title: Great phone-crappy battery
Reviews.Author: Amber Aileen Cory
Reviews.Content: The phone works and is in great shape, as described. Only thing is it needs a new battery, as the dampness indicator was pink and doesn't stay charged long.

Reviews.Title: So/so
Reviews.Author: Taylor Stevenson
Reviews.Content: It was not a bad phone. But it was very slow! I needed an emergency phone I'm a college student and my phone was broke so I needed a quick fix. Over all it was not bad but it wasn't the best!

Reviews.Title: This company is a rip off, the phone doesn't work...
Reviews.Author: Amanda James
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and the first one wouldn't work, talk to the company and the got another phone, the new phone just came in and it doesn't work. I would not buy this phone at all. Save your money...

Reviews.Title: Slow reaction
Reviews.Author: Darryl
Reviews.Content: I really like what this phone can do when I compare it to my iPhone 3gs, the widgets on it are extremely useful. The biggest problem I've hand with this phone though is that it's response time is slow. Apps will crash constantly, audio files will takes as long as 10 seconds after you hit the pause button to stop playing. This was an extremely annoying part of my phone before I realized what was going on (now it's just annoying) I would hit the pause button over and over thinking maybe I missed it or it didn't register, finally it would turn off and I'd think I was good slipping it into my pocket. I'd walk a ways (as long as 30 seconds later) and all of the sudden the audio would go off again.ProsPhone size is perfectWidgets are usefulCustomization is very user friendly once understoodConsPhones processor is to slow for the phoneCan't run all apps from the market, you'll want to research specific apps if you are considering purchasing themAlarm snooze seems to be every single button on the phone

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Mary L.
Reviews.Content: I received the phone on time.  I gave it to my son.  The touch screen is not working.  I would like to return the phone.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Lizzi
Reviews.Content: On here it said the phone was in great condition, but once I got it the screen was all scratched up and the messages freeze then close down on me in the middle of a text. The touch screen freezes sometimes. When I recieved the phone the wrong charger was sent with the phone so I had to go buy a charger before I could even activate and start using the phone. I was very dissapointed.
